AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, after Tax
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.description: Amount, after tax, of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement.

BankOwnedLifeInsurance.label: Bank Owned Life Insurance
BankOwnedLifeInsurance.description: The carrying amount of a life insurance policy on an officer, executive or employee for which the reporting entity (a bank) is entitled to proceeds from the policy upon death of the insured or surrender of the insurance policy.

DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Rate of Compensation Increase
DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.description: Weighted average rate of compensation increase used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, pay-related defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, after Year Five for Next Five Years
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in five fiscal years after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year One
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Five
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Four
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Three
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Two
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Service Cost
DefinedBenefitPlanServiceCost.description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Employees' Gross Pay
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage of employees' gross pay for which the employer contributes a matching contribution to a defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Match
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage employer matches of the employee's percentage contribution matched.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Excluding Option, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost to be recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

NumberOfBusinessesAcquired.label: Number of Businesses Acquired
NumberOfBusinessesAcquired.description: The number of businesses acquired by the entity during the period.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

PostageExpense.label: Postage Expense
PostageExpense.description: Amount of expense associated with postage.

PostemploymentBenefitsPeriodExpense.label: Postemployment Benefits, Period Expense
PostemploymentBenefitsPeriodExpense.description: Period expense related to postemployment benefits.

RestructuringReserve.label: Restructuring Reserve
RestructuringReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price, Purchase Date
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Discount rate from fair value on purchase date that participants pay for shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Maximum Employee Subscription Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The highest percentage of annual salary that an employee is permitted to utilize with respect to the plan.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Other Share Increase (Decrease) in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could acquire or could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to any other type of change in shares reserved for issuance.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

DerivativeNotionalAmount.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.

OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other liabilities.
